name: The War Will Win
description:
This demo showcases the core mechanics of the game. We will soon be starting a Kickstarter campaign where we describe and mention all the features of our game in detail. The link will be here soon🤗 What's the war about?

The War Will Win is a classic turn-based strategy game with the added uncertainty and luck of card games.

Troubles brewing at the borders and something isn’t normal about it. All the factions are preparing for something! Does the disappearance of civilians at the border, related to this? Whatever is the reason, you'll soon learn that all war comes at a price, and no matter who remains to stand, only The War will ever win.

The war is in progress!

Our team consistently works on the game but since we are a very small team, things can get delayed or slowed down. You can stay up to date with the game over on our Twitter or our Instagram.
